Big Data Analytics, Data Mining, and Intelligent Systems. Applied Artificial Intelligence. Computational Intelligence, and Optimization Algorithms. Selected Publications: Ishraque, M.T, Zjalic, N., Zadeh, P. M, Kobti, Z., Olla, P. (2018), Cardiac Rehabilitation Therapy Recommendation System. In 2018 IEEE MIT URTC. (in press) Moradianzadeh, N., Zadeh, P. M., Kobti, Z., & Pfaff, K. (2018), Using Social Network Analysis to Model Palliative Care. Journal of network and computer applications, Elsevier. 120 (2018): 30-41. Moradianzadeh, N., Zadeh, P. M., Kobti, Z., & Pfaff, K. (2018), Using social network analysis to optimize the Circle of Care in Compassionate Communities. 22nd International Congress on Palliative Care. Singh, D.; Zadeh, P.M, Kobti, Z.(2018), A Multilevel Cooperative Multi-Population Cultural Algorithm, 2018 IEEE International Conference on Innovations in Intelligent Systems and Applications (INISTA), IEEE. Selvarajah, K., Zadeh, P.M, Kobti, Z.; Kargar, M., Tazim, Mohd, Pfaff, K.(2018), Team Formation in Community-Based Palliative Care, 2018 IEEE International Conference on Innovations in Intelligent Systems and Applications (INISTA), IEEE. Selvarajah, K., Zadeh, P.M., Kargar, M., & Kobti, Z. (2017). A Knowledge-based Computational Algorithm for Discovering a Team of Experts in Social Networks. In KDD Workshop on Data-Driven Discovery (DDD) in conjunction with the 23rd ACM SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (KDD), 2017. Moradianzadeh, N., Zadeh, P. M., Kobti, Z., & Pfaff, K. (2017, July). An Agent Model to Support Social Network-Based Palliative Care. In Computers and Communications (ISCC), 2017 IEEE Symposium on (pp. 300-305). IEEE. Zadeh, P. M., Pandey, M., & Kobti, Z. (2016, July). A Study on Population Adaptation in Social Networks Based on Knowledge Migration in Cultural Algorithm. In Evolutionary Computation (IEEE CEC), 2016 IEEE Congress on (pp. 4405-4412). IEEE. Zadeh P.M., Kobti Z. (2016) A Knowledge-Based Framework for Link Prediction in Social Networks. In: Gyssens M., Simari G. (eds) Foundations of Information and Knowledge Systems. FoIKS 2016. Lecture Notes in Computer Science, vol 9616. Springer. (Selected Paper) Zadeh, P. M., & Kobti, Z. (2015). A Multi-Population Cultural Algorithm for Community Detection in Social Networks. Procedia Computer Science, 52, 342-349. Elsevier Mohi, M., Movaghar, A., & Zadeh, P. M. (2009, January). A Bayesian Game Approach for Preventing Dos Attacks in Wireless Sensor Networks. In Communications and Mobile Computing, 2009. CMC'09. WRI International Conference on (Vol. 3, pp. 507-511). IEEE. Zadeh, P. M., & Moshkenani, M. S. (2008, November). Mining Social Network for Semantic Advertisement. In Convergence and Hybrid Information Technology, 2008. ICCIT'08. Third International Conference on (Vol. 1, pp. 611-618). IEEE.
